00070     protected function processLogs( $logs = array() )
00071     {
00072         try
00073         {
00074             $_logFile = $this->getLogPath() . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR . $this->getLogFile();
00075 
00076             if ( @filesize( $_logFile ) > $this->getMaxFileSize() * 1024 )
00077                 $this->rotateFiles();
00078 
00079             //  Write out the log entries
00080             foreach ( $logs as $_log )
00081             {
00082                 $_exclude = false;
00083 
00084                 //  Check out the exclusions
00085                 if ( ! empty( $this->_excludeCategories ) )
00086                 {
00087                     foreach ( $this->_excludeCategories as $_category )
00088                     {
00089                         //  If found, we skip
00090                         if ( trim( strtolower( $_category ) ) == trim( strtolower( $_log[2] ) ) )
00091                         {
00092                             $_exclude = true;
00093                             break;
00094                         }
00095 
00096                         //  Check for regex
00097                         if ( '/' == $_category[0] && 0 != @preg_match( $_category, $_log[2] ) )
00098                         {
00099                             $_exclude = true;
00100                             break;
00101                         }
00102                     }
00103                 }
00104 
00108                 if ( ! $_exclude )
00109                     error_log( $this->formatLogMessage( $_log[0], $_log[1], $_log[2], $_log[3] ), 3, $_logFile );
00110             }
00111 
00112             //  Processed, clear!
00113             $this->logs = null;
00114         }
00115         catch ( Exception $_ex )
00116         {
00117             error_log( __METHOD__ . ': Exception processing application logs: ' . $_ex->getMessage() );
00118         }
00119     }
00120 
00129     protected function formatLogMessage( $message, $level = 'I', $category = null, $time = null )
00130     {
00131         if ( null === $time )
00132             $time = time();
00133 
00134         $level = strtoupper( $level[0] );
00135 
00136         return @date( 'M d H:i:s', $time ) . ' [' . sprintf( '%-' . $this->_categoryWidth . 's', $category ) . '] ' . ': <' . $level . '> ' . $message . PHP_EOL;
00137     }
00138 }
